headline: Medical Device Stocks Fall on Tariff Hit
summary: President Trump’s tariffs will hit pacemakers, X-ray machines and other medical devices manufactured overseas and shipped to the U.S.  Devices and diagnostic equipment are made all over the world, from China and Europe to Malaysia and Vietnam.  Many manufacturers are well positioned to weather tariffs because patients will need to get their products, but Wells Fargo estimated companies’ annual earnings per share could take a hit as much as 13.8% in the case of Bausch & Lomb.

raw.headline: Medical Device Stocks Fall on Tariff Hit
raw.summary: President Trump’s tariffs will hit pacemakers, X-ray machines and other medical devices manufactured overseas and shipped to the U.S.  Devices and diagnostic equipment are made all over the world, from China and Europe to Malaysia and Vietnam. headline: Boston Scientific’s Farapulse matches Medtronic cryoablation in trial
summary: Atrial tachyarrhythmia recurred in 39 patients treated with Boston Scientific’s Farapulse PFA device, while 53 people had recurrence in the Medtronic cryoablation group.

raw.headline: Boston Scientific’s Farapulse matches Medtronic cryoablation in trial
